verbs.description: Unlike other foreign policy issues , where Trump [V: seems] [ARG1: neither informed nor particularly interested] , he has wrestled with the balance between threats and cajolery with North Korea .
Unlike other foreign policy issues , where Trump seems neither informed nor particularly interested , he [V: has] wrestled with the balance between threats and cajolery with North Korea .
